snippet.title: Amiga Longplay Defender Of The Crown
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played by NOX1911

Seems the catapult munition cannot be changed as on the c64 version. Never realized that you loose all men if one of your castles gets captured. Maybe a bug or emulation error.. whatsoever. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
